original_text: The first was like a lion, and had eagle's wings: I beheld till the wings thereof were plucked, and it was lifted up from the earth, and made stand upon the feet as a man, and a man's heart was given to it.
korean_text: 첫째는 사자와 같은데 독수리의 날개가 있더니 내가 보는 중에 그 날개가 뽑혔고 또 땅에서 들려서 사람처럼 두 발로 서게 함을 받았으며 또 사람의 마음을 받았더라 또 보니

sentences.original_text: The first was like a lion
I beheld till the wings thereof were plucked
and it was lifted up from the earth
and made stand upon the feet as a man
and a man's heart was given to it
